column5: doing it right mike. wait till mikey hits his stride. the old man will never keep up lol.
Lol that's ok with me George I can be his net man all day long.

Well yesterday Mikey and I headed out on LSC for some fishing we started off casting for a couple hours I lost one right away and had two other follows Mikey had a few gar pike follow his line but no takers. We switched up to do some trolling and popped this one about 30 min in after the battle and a nice quick release he was ready to head home. Great day out for about 3 hours with my Boy.  http://youtu.be/QxwDYsjRHAE?list=UUcvHTMSDyGr7ABbDFF51nrw
Awesome Mike, Congrats to Mikey!
Great video Mike and congrats to your son an a very nice fish.
Well done Mikey, great picture
Sweet fish!  Great job!
forgive my ignorance...LSC?  Awesome photo, i love photos when the fish is as big as the kid who caught it.
beauty fish for your son nice going! September 13th I hope I can hoist a couple, weather being the biggest factor haha
forgive my ignorance...LSC?   Lake St. Clair down near Windsor
Ahhh yes, thanks for that...i need to fish some of the southern lakes some time, it is crazy how different they are from Georgian Bay.
Great way to start the season.   Congrats
nice fish good video
Awesome Mike! And Mikey!
Sweet fish and definitely worth waking up for.  lol.
Thanks everyone we have fun on the water together.  September will be a great month to get down here
That was very cool Mike.  Nice fish there young one.
Very nice fish. Is September the best month for casting?

I can't say it's better then August October or November they are all great.  Brian I was shocked when he was standing up fighting it he usually likes to sit for the battle but then again when jade was 9 she landed a 49 1/4" I wish I had the cameras back then
Great fun for your son!!!,you must be proud!
nice fish, congrats.
Nice job Mike. I recognized your boat I thought anyways. Pretty sure I saw you out there casting in the morning. We were the other line boat out in that area. We did well:)

Yeah we had fun messing around there then headed around for a boat ride then started some trolling. If he was not with me I would have been there earlier and stayed on the casting program. But that's what you have to do to keep the kids into fishing. I would hate to make him sick of fishing. Glad to hear you did good how hot did it get out there? I know it was already warm when we left.
Brings back memories. Congratulations and thanks for sharing.
I jumped in the lake three times. Lol.
Heckuva fish!
It was warm enough for a good swim and I would think that most should have gone in if they were out for the day.
